lines.i: The template contains information regarding the availability of results from an autopsy.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:200)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:201)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:203)/@code="69436-4" Autopsy results available (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:202)
A code that indicates that information about the availability of autopsy results is provided.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:204)
An indicator that tells whether an autopsy report is available for the decedent.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:205)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:206)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:207)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:208)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:209)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:210)/@code="18743-5" Autopsy Report (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:211)
The code value indicates that the observation contains the autopsy report.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ED (CONF:212)
The content of the autopsy report.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:200)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:201)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:203)/@code="69436-4" Autopsy results available (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:202)
A code that indicates that information about the availability of autopsy results is provided.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:204)
An indicator that tells whether an autopsy report is available for the decedent.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:205)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:206)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:207)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:208)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:209)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:210)/@code="18743-5" Autopsy Report (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:211)
The code value indicates that the observation contains the autopsy report.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ED (CONF:212)
The content of the autopsy report.
